mainBoard.name: Falconer Adept
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Falconer Adept attacks, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.

rulings.text: Although the Bird is an attacking creature, it was never declared as an attacking creature. This means that abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks won't trigger when it enters the battlefield attacking.
Any effects that say that the Bird can't attack (such as that of Propaganda) affect only the declaration of attackers. They won't stop the Bird token from entering the battlefield attacking.
You choose which player or planeswalker the Bird token is attacking. It doesn't have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker that Falconer Adept is attacking.

mainBoard.name: Celestial Enforcer
mainBoard.originalText: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with flying.

rulings.text: Once you begin activating Celestial Enforcer's ability, players can't take any other actions until you're done activating it. Notably, they can't try to remove your creatures with flying to make it illegal to activate the ability.

mainBoard.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Activate only if you control a creature with flying.

mainBoard.flavorText: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.
mainBoard.name: Tandem Tactics

rulings.text: You can cast Tandem Tactics with no targets. When it resolves, you’ll gain 2 life. However, if you cast Tandem Tactics with any targets and all of those targets are illegal as it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t gain 2 life in that case.

mainBoard.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Within her battalion she was known as the Angel of Arkvale. Until now, that was only a metaphor.

foreignData.flavorText: In ihrem Bataillon war sie als der Engel von Archental bekannt. Bis jetzt war das nur eine Metapher.
foreignData.name: Engelhafter Aufstieg
foreignData.text: Schicke eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl ins Exil. Ihr bzw. sein Beherrscher erzeugt einen 4/4 weißen Engel-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText: Su batallón la llamaba el Ángel de Arkvale. No era más que una metáfora... hasta ahora.
foreignData.name: Ascensión angelical
foreignData.text: Exilia la criatura o planeswalker objetivo. Su controlador crea una ficha de criatura Ángel blanca 4/4 con la habilidad de volar.

foreignData.flavorText: Dans son bataillon, on l'appelait l'ange de Valdarc. Jusqu'à maintenant, ce n'était qu'une métaphore.
foreignData.name: Ascension angélique
foreignData.text: Exilez la créature ciblée ou le planeswalker ciblé. Son contrôleur crée un jeton de créature 4/4 blanche Ange avec le vol.

foreignData.flavorText: Nel suo battaglione tutti la chiamavano l'Angelo di Vallarca. Fino ad ora, era solo una metafora.
foreignData.name: Ascesa Angelica
foreignData.text: Esilia una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio. Il suo controllore crea una pedina creatura Angelo 4/4 bianca con volare.

foreignData.flavorText: 所属部隊では「アークベイルの天使」と呼ばれていたが、今まではそれは単なる比喩だった。
foreignData.name: 天使への昇天
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。それのコントローラーは、飛行を持つ白の４/４の天使・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。

foreignData.flavorText: 그녀는 자신이 속한 부대에서 아크베일의 천사로 알려져 있었다. 지금까지는 그 말이 그냥 비유일 뿐이었다.
foreignData.name: 천사의 승천
foreignData.text: 생물이나 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 추방한다. 그 지속물의 조종자는 비행을 가진 4/4 백색 천사 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.flavorText: No batalhão, ela era conhecida como o Anjo de Arcovale. E até agora era só uma metáfora.
foreignData.name: Ascensão Angelical
foreignData.text: Exile a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo. Seu controlador cria uma ficha de criatura branca 4/4 do tipo Anjo com voar.

foreignData.flavorText: Ее, ведущую свой батальон в бой, называли Ангелом Арквейла. До нынешнего дня это была лишь метафора.
foreignData.name: Ангельское Вознесение
foreignData.text: Изгоните целевое существо или planeswalker'а. Контролирующий его игрок создает одну фишку существа 4/4 белый Ангел с Полетом.

foreignData.flavorText: 她在军中享有「雅克谷天使」美誉。但此前都只不过是比喻而已。

foreignData.flavorText: 她在軍中享有「雅克谷天使」美譽。但此前都只不過是比喻而已。

mainBoard.name: Angelic Ascension
mainBoard.originalText: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

rulings.text: If the target permanent is an illegal target by the time Angelic Ascension tries to resolve, the spell won't resolve. No player will create an Angel token.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

mainBoard.name: Sky Tether

rulings.text: Sky Tether can enchant a creature that never had flying at all.
The enchanted creature can later gain flying from another effect.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender and loses flying.
